Articles.Content:
I would like to share some of my kebal inspred drawings here but this post like others is probably not going to get approved either. I am not elite enough to post links or pictures here yet it seems.

I am active on the googleplus ksp community.

Hello Kokoro, and welcome to the forums!

There is a system in place to prevent spambots which requires your first three posts to be approved by a moderator. After that, you should have all the normal privileges.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the forums!

As Starhawk mentioned, we moderators have to manually verify a poster's initial posts mainly as an anti-spambot measure. As part of that, until a user has cleared the queue, certain posting permissions are restricted to keep spambots from using dirty dirty exploits to get their message out. The good news is that the bar to clear the queue is very low (only 3 posts IIRC), so you should be good to go with just a couple more verified posts.

That said, we hope you enjoy your experience on the forums.

Thanks for the replies.

So it is three posts before the extraperissions are granted? This is post two.
